definition: see 磨杵成針|磨杵成针[mo2 chu3 cheng2 zhen1]
iron (metal)/arms/weapons/hard/strong/violent/unshakeable/determined/close/tight (slang)
surname Tie
pestle/to poke
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
surname Cheng
needle/pin/injection/stitch/CL:根[gen1],支[zhi1]
variant of 針|针[zhen1], needle
to grind an iron bar down to a fine needle (idiom); fig. to persevere in a difficult task/to study diligently
dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success/You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up./Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.
dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success/You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up./Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.
dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success/You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up./Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.
effort will undoubtedly lead to success (idiom)

If you work at it hard enough, you can grind an iron bar into a needle./cf idiom 磨杵成針|磨杵成针, to grind an iron bar down to a fine needle (idiom); fig. to persevere in a difficult task/to study diligently

lit. to pierce the wall to steal a light (idiom)/fig. to study diligently in the face of hardship
a really determined person will find a solution (idiom); where there's a will, there's a way
